title: Kraft Heinz Foods Company Recalls Turkey Bacon Products Due To Possible Adulteration
summary: WASHINGTON, August 25, 2015 Kraft Heinz Foods Company, a Newberry, S.C. establishment, is recalling approximately 2,068,467 pounds of turkey bacon products that may be adulterated because it may spoil before the Best When Used By date, the U.S. Department of Agricultures Food Safety and Inspection...
